issue.title: [Gandiva] [Python] Make it possible to list all functions registered with Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3746](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3746). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will also be useful for documentation purposes (right now it is not very easy to get a list of all the functions that are registered).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3746?focusedCommentId=16683016) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2933
